title: Wet Paint
description: When up and coming artist Savannah heads out from her small Alabama hometown to start a new life in California, she has no idea what she’ll find on the way. A brief stop in Austin entwines her with a sexy Latina named Dulce—a woman who lives a life of mystery and seduction. Savannah’s steadfast focus on her west coast destination is quickly tested by Dulce’s allure. Follow Savannah on her journey as she discovers that the road to her deepest desires can be a bit slippery when wet.Intended for mature readers.
author: Sera Breen
